overview: Sometimes the most terrifying enemy is yourself. Stareon is a likable kid that has the challenge of overcoming the evil that lurks in his own mind. He simply wants a little adventure in his life which he has become bored with. Conversely, the one on one elite academy doesnâ€™t really add this to his day to day activities. Meanwhile, his struggle takes you on an adventure.
title: QT World: Fearless I Am
